title: Coriander Coconut Chutney / Kothimeera Kobbari Chutney
content:
Ingredients: Roasted Chickpea/ Pappulu - 3 Tb sp Fresh grated Coconut - 1 cup Coriander - 1/2 cup Green chillies - 4 Lemon juice - 1 tea spoon Salt - As per taste For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Take Roasted chickpea, green chillies, salt, coriander leaves add in mixer grinder blend them to medium coarse paste
  • Add grated coconut in the same jar and make smooth paste
  • Take out the paste in a bowl
  • Add lemon juice and mix well
  • Finally add tempering to coriander coconut chutney
  • Serve it with idly/ dosa/ puri
  • Enjoy it with your favorite type of dosa
